= Baetle examples =

== Netbeans Issuezilla == 


  <[http://www.netbeans.org/issues/show_bug.cgi?id=130267]> a baetle:Bug ;
    baetle:summary "AssertionError: Parent of D:\install\6.1_200803170003\userdir\update\deactivate\to_uninstall.txt exists and is directory.";
    wf:state [ a baetle:Reopened ] ;
    baetle:environment "All" ;
    baetle:reporter [ a sioc:User;
                      foaf:accountName "novakm"
                    ] ;
    baetle:assigned_to [ a sioc:User;
                      foaf:accountName "jrechtacek"
                    ] ;
    baetle:qa_contact [ a sioc:User; 
                      foaf:mbox "issues@autoupdate"
                    ] ;
    baetle:comment
        [ a sioc:Post;
          dc:title "Created an attachment (id=58470)";
          sioc:has_creator [ a sioc:User; 
                             foaf:accountName "jrechtacek" ;
                             foaf:mbox "jrechtacek@nospamplease"
                           ] ;
          sioc:attachment <[http://www.netbeans.org/nonav/issues/showattachment.cgi/58470/]>
        ] ;

    #Priority P3 mapped to Major
    baetle:isMajorFor
        [ is <[http://netbeans.org]> ;
          a doap:Project ;
          doap:release [ a doap:Version ;
                         doap:revision "6.1" 
                       ];
        ] ;
    baetle:about [ a baetle:SoftwarePackage ;
                   baetle:name "autoupdate";
                   baetle:contains [ a baetle:SoftwarePackage; 
                                     baetle:name "code";
                                   ] ;
                 ]

  .
